description: Multi-agent scenario where two agents work on overlapping concerns and may introduce conflicting patterns

scenario.expected_conflict: Both agents may modify src/api files with different patterns

agent_a_prompt: Implement a new endpoint in src/api/users.ts for fetching user preferences. Use snake_case for the response object keys to match our PostgreSQL column names.
agent_b_prompt: Create a useUserPreferences hook that fetches from the user preferences API. Follow the existing camelCase conventions in the codebase.

expected_drifts.description: Agent A uses snake_case, Agent B expects camelCase

pass_criteria.description: Both agents produce working code with consistent naming conventions
